unbam

Source: R/Functions.R
unbam.Rd

Turns a BAM to a FASTA file

unbam(bam, outfa = NULL)

Arguments

bam

BAM file to turn to FASTA
outfa

PATH to output FASTA

Value

Path to FASTA file

Author

Kathryn Rozen-Gagnon

Examples

testFasta <- system.file("extdata/hg19Small.fa",package="CLIPflexR")
myIndex <- bowtie2_index(testFasta)

#> Warning: For argument `bt2Index`, file exist:/Users/runner/work/_temp/Library/CLIPflexR/extdata/hg19Small.1.bt2. It will be overwrited
#> Warning: For argument `bt2Index`, file exist:/Users/runner/work/_temp/Library/CLIPflexR/extdata/hg19Small.2.bt2. It will be overwrited
#> Warning: For argument `bt2Index`, file exist:/Users/runner/work/_temp/Library/CLIPflexR/extdata/hg19Small.3.bt2. It will be overwrited
#> Warning: For argument `bt2Index`, file exist:/Users/runner/work/_temp/Library/CLIPflexR/extdata/hg19Small.4.bt2. It will be overwrited
#> Warning: For argument `bt2Index`, file exist:/Users/runner/work/_temp/Library/CLIPflexR/extdata/hg19Small.rev.1.bt2. It will be overwrited
#> Warning: For argument `bt2Index`, file exist:/Users/runner/work/_temp/Library/CLIPflexR/extdata/hg19Small.rev.2.bt2. It will be overwrited
testFQ <- system.file("extdata/Fox3_Std_small.fq.gz",package="CLIPflexR")
FqFile_FF <- ctk_fastqFilter(testFQ,qsFilter = "mean:0-29:20",verbose=TRUE)

#> fastq_filter.pl command is /Users/runner/Library/r-miniconda/envs/CLIPflexR_0.1.18/bin/ctk/fastq_filter.pl
#> fastq_filter.pl arguments are /Users/runner/Library/r-miniconda/envs/CLIPflexR_0.1.18/bin/ctk/fastq_filter.pl  -if sanger  -of fastq  -f mean:0-29:20  /Users/runner/work/_temp/Library/CLIPflexR/extdata/Fox3_Std_small.fq.gz  /Users/runner/work/_temp/Library/CLIPflexR/extdata/FF_Fox3_Std_small.fq.gz 
FqFile <- decompress(FqFile_FF,overwrite=TRUE)
FqFile_clipped <- fastx_clipper(FqFile,length=20)
FqFile_QF <- fastq_quality_trimmer(FqFile_clipped)
FqFile_QF <- fastq_quality_trimmer(FqFile_clipped,paste0(FqFile_QF,".gz"))
FqFile_Col <- ctk_fastq2collapse(FqFile_QF,verbose=TRUE)

#> fastq_filter.pl command is /Users/runner/Library/r-miniconda/envs/CLIPflexR_0.1.18/bin/ctk/fastq2collapse.pl
#> fastq_filter.pl arguments are /Users/runner/Library/r-miniconda/envs/CLIPflexR_0.1.18/bin/ctk/fastq2collapse.pl  /Users/runner/work/_temp/Library/CLIPflexR/extdata/QF_FF_Fox3_Std_small_clip.fq.gz  /Users/runner/work/_temp/Library/CLIPflexR/extdata/Collapsed_QF_FF_Fox3_Std_small_clip.fq 
FqFile_QFColStripped <- ctk_stripBarcode(FqFile_Col,linkerlength=5)
bam <- bowtie_align(FqFile_QFColStripped,myIndex)
unbam(bam)

#> [1] "/Users/runner/work/_temp/Library/CLIPflexR/extdata/Sorted_Collapsed_QF_FF_Fox3_Std_small_clip.fq_rm5.gzfa_unmapped.fa"
